statements.select:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.text) as RowNo , AA.ID , AA.CreatedOn , AA.CreatedBy , AA.CreatedByName , AA.UpdatedOn , AA.UpdatedBy , AA.UpdatedByName
, AA.value , AA.text
, AA.ApiRequestID , M3.Name as ApiType , M4.Name as Status , BB.RequestDate
FROM IKScrap.dbo.TSmapsColor AA WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN IKScrap.dbo.TApiRequest BB WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.ApiRequestID = BB.ID LEFT JOIN IKBase.dbo.TCode M3 WITH (NOLOCK) ON BB.ApiType = M3.Code AND M3.ParentCode = 'ApiType' LEFT JOIN IKBase.dbo.TCode M4 WITH (NOLOCK) ON BB.Status = M4.Code AND M4.ParentCode = 'ApiStatus' WHERE 1=1
AND AA.ApiRequestID = #ApiRequestID#
AND AA.value = #ColorValue#
AND ( AA.text LIKE '%'+#FindText#+'%' )
ORDER BY RowNo
SELECT * FROM IKScrap.dbo.TSmapsColor AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.ID = #ID#
SELECT * FROM IKScrap.dbo.TSmapsColor AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.value = #value#
SELECT * FROM IKScrap.dbo.TSmapsColor AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.value = #value#
statements.insert:
INSERT INTO dbo.TSmapsColor ( CreatedOn, CreatedBy, CreatedByName, ApiRequestID, value, text ) VALUES ( GetDate(), #CreatedBy#, #CreatedByName#, #ApiRequestID#, #value#, #text# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
statements.update:
UPDATE IKScrap.dbo.TSmapsColor SET UpdatedOn = GetDate() , UpdatedBy = #UpdatedBy# , UpdatedByName = #UpdatedByName#
, ApiRequestID = #ApiRequestID# , value = #value# , text = #text# WHERE ID = #ID#
